function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and hygiene measures within the workplace","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among employees and visitors","Mitigation":"Enforce strict compliance with social distancing, hygiene, and PPE protocols","Technologies":"Usage of engineering controls such as physical barriers, ventilation, and humidity control","People":"Employees, visitors, and the public","Owner":"Employers and management"},{"Description":"Lack of differentiation in safety measures for vaccinated and unvaccinated employees","Impact":"Potential risk of disease spread among unvaccinated employees","Mitigation":"Enforce consistent safety measures for all employees regardless of vaccination status","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Unvaccinated employees","Owner":"Employers and management"},{"Description":"Inadequate response plan for high-level exposure risk tasks and environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in high-risk work environments","Mitigation":"Develop and implement a comprehensive exposure response plan for high-risk tasks and environments","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Employees, visitors, and the public in high-risk environments","Owner":"Employers and management"}]}
